name: Escape From Black Hole (LaPLaS games inc.)
name_original: Escape From Black Hole (LaPLaS games inc.)
description: Hello! This game was made for Clicker Jam Winter 2023. You are a traveler whose spaceship has been sucked into a black hole and to get out of it you need to accelerate the ship to light speed (300,000 km/s). This is very difficult task, so you need to assemble a team of aliens, that will help you upgrade your ship. Also try to do it as fast as possible and get into the high score table. Good luck!
